bibl.title: Orders for payment and delivery from the dossier of Abraham
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Mich. Inv. 3732; 4162d P. N.Y.U. Inv. 412 verso
W. Graham Claytor, Orders for Payment and Delivery from the Dossier of Abraham.

1. P. N.Y.U. Inv. 412 verso. Order for Delivery of Fat. Oxyrhynchite (?), 29 Aug., VI CE. - 2. P. Mich. Inv. 3732. Order for Payment. Oxyrhynchite (?), 28 Oct. - 26 Nov., VI CE. - 3. P. Mich. Inv. 4162d. Order for Payment of Wages. Oxyrhynchite (?), 25 Feb. - 26 Mar., VI CE.
